title: Bomb

fields.name: Abilites:
fields.value: - Pass around your bomb at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the person holding your bomb dies, everyone visiting them and the target themselves are dealt an Unstoppable attack.
- If the target dies the night they get the bomb from you specifically, you will also die.
- The player holding your bomb will return unfavorable results to Investigatives regardless of their role.
- When your bomb goes off, you must spend 2 nights building another one.
- You may target yourself to hold your bomb for the night.
